column3: a provider of extended warranty contracts

column2: AT&T; rejects Netflix call for free interconnection as unfair NEW YORK
column3: March 21 AT&T; on Friday dismissed Netflix's recent call for free interconnection as an arrogant and unfair attempt to force others to pay for the content provider to gain access to faster broadband speeds and better services.

column4: in anticipation of comparable rules abroad.
